GMCM_Option_SetupKey_Tooltip: Sets up the board with a fresh set of chess pieces.
GMCM_Option_ClearKey_Tooltip: Removes all chess pieces from the board.
GMCM_Paragraph_FreeMode_Text: By default, piece movements are constrained to legal chess moves. Free mode allows you to setup the board as you like and move pieces without constraint.
GMCM_Option_ChangeKey_Tooltip: Cycles the piece at the hovered square through the available piece types, or add a white pawn to the square if it is empty.
GMCM_Option_ChangeModKey_Tooltip: Hold down this key while pressing the Change Key to change the piece color instead of the piece type.
GMCM_Option_RemoveKey_Tooltip: Removes the piece at the hovered square.
